name: Project 4 (thamarauder)
description:
Uploading Lab 4 for class.

All features in this final product include:
A "main menu" with an interactive "play" button. This button will send the user to the game.
Pressing "A" will animate the cube, and pressing "N" will stop said animation.
Right-clicking on the mouse will animate the sphere above the cube. Right-clicking again will stop its animation.
Four sliders that change the color and rotation speed of the cube.
A built-in clock.
A coordinate-finder that shows up on the UI.
The cube will turn invisible if the space bar is pressed - highly recommended to do after trying everything else.
Left-click creates mini-primitive prefabs (spheres).
